org.mini2Dx.core.engine

Interface Sizeable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CollisionShape
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollisionBox, CollisionCircle, CollisionPolygon

    public interface Sizeable
    A common interface for objects that can be sized with an x and y dimension

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Sizeable>
      void      		 addSizeChangeListener(SizeChangeListener<T> listener)
      Adds a SizeChangeListener to be notified of size changes
      float getHeight()
      Returns the height of this object
      int getId()
      Returns the unique id of this object
      float getMaxX()
      Returns max X coordinate of this object
      float getMaxY()
      Returns max Y coordinate of this object
      float getMinX()
      Returns min X coordinate of this object
      float getMinY()
      Returns min Y coordinate of this object
      float getWidth()
      Returns the width of this object
      <T extends Sizeable>
      void      		 removeSizeChangeListener(SizeChangeListener<T> listener)
      Removes a SizeChangeListener to stop it being notified of size changes

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        int getId()
        Returns the unique id of this object
        Returns:

      • getWidth

        float getWidth()
        Returns the width of this object
        Returns:
        0 by default

      • getHeight

        float getHeight()
        Returns the height of this object
        Returns:
        0 by default

      • getMinX

        float getMinX()
        Returns min X coordinate of this object
        Returns:
        The left-most x coordinate

      • getMinY

        float getMinY()
        Returns min Y coordinate of this object
        Returns:
        The up-most y coordinate

      • getMaxX

        float getMaxX()
        Returns max X coordinate of this object
        Returns:
        The right-most x coordinate

      • getMaxY

        float getMaxY()
        Returns max Y coordinate of this object
        Returns:
        The bottom-most y coordinate

      • addSizeChangeListener

        <T extends Sizeable> void addSizeChangeListener(SizeChangeListener<T> listener)
        Adds a SizeChangeListener to be notified of size changes

        listener - The SizeChangeListener to add

      • removeSizeChangeListener

        <T extends Sizeable> void removeSizeChangeListener(SizeChangeListener<T> listener)
        Removes a SizeChangeListener to stop it being notified of size changes
        Parameters:
        listener - The SizeChangeListener to remove
